name: part_009
file: tmp_【#兎田ぺこら３周年 ⧸ 3DLIVE】Chu! Summer Party♪【ホロライブ】 [Di8D8BvZZp0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Usada Pekora and Natsuiro Matsuri perform the song 'Natsuiro' on a summer-themed stage.
Usada Pekora and Shirogane Noel perform the song 'A Perfect Sky'.
Usada Pekora and Houshou Marine perform the song 'HOT LIMIT'.
Usada Pekora, Houshou Marine, Shirogane Noel, and Natsuiro Matsuri perform 'secret base ~Kimi ga Kureta Mono~'.

subtitles.original: 夏色
subtitles.english: Natsuiro

subtitles.original: 君の家の猫はあくびをしながら
subtitles.english: Your cat at home is yawning while

subtitles.original: 今日も一日を過ごしてゆく
subtitles.english: it spends another day today.

subtitles.original: 何も変わらない
subtitles.english: Nothing has changed in this

subtitles.original: お馴染みのこの街並み
subtitles.english: all too familiar cityscape.

subtitles.original: みんな夏が来たって浮かれ気分なのに
subtitles.english: Everyone's in a festive mood because summer has come,

subtitles.original: 君は一人冴えない顔してるね
subtitles.english: but you're the only one with a dull look on your face.

subtitles.original: そうだ君に見せたいものがあるんだ
subtitles.english: That's right, there's something I want to show you.

subtitles.original: 大きな五時半の夕焼け
subtitles.english: A big sunset at 5:30,

subtitles.original: 子どもの頃と同じように
subtitles.english: just like when we were kids,

subtitles.original: 海も空も雲も 僕らでさえも 染めてゆくから
subtitles.english: as it colors the sea, the sky, the clouds, and even us.

subtitles.original: この長い長い下り坂を
subtitles.english: Down this long, long downhill slope,

subtitles.original: 君を自転車の後ろに乗せて
subtitles.english: with you on the back of my bicycle,

subtitles.original: ブレーキいっぱい握りしめて
subtitles.english: gripping the brakes tight,

subtitles.original: ゆっくりゆっくり下ってゆく
subtitles.english: we'll slowly, slowly go down.

subtitles.original: A Perfect Sky
subtitles.english: A Perfect Sky

subtitles.original: 君の胸で泣かない
subtitles.english: I won't cry in your arms.

subtitles.original: 君に胸貸さない
subtitles.english: I won't lend you my shoulder.

subtitles.original: I'm looking for a perfect sky
subtitles.english: I'm looking for a perfect sky

subtitles.original: I'm looking for a perfect sky
subtitles.english: I'm looking for a perfect sky

subtitles.original: いたずらな猫みたく
subtitles.english: Like a mischievous cat,

subtitles.original: 夏の陽をかすめて走る
subtitles.english: running, brushing past the summer sun.

subtitles.original: I'm looking for a perfect sky
subtitles.english: I'm looking for a perfect sky

subtitles.original: I'm looking for a perfect sky
subtitles.english: I'm looking for a perfect sky

subtitles.original: HOT LIMIT
subtitles.english: HOT LIMIT

subtitles.original: 都会のビルの海じゃ
subtitles.english: In the sea of urban buildings,

subtitles.original: 感じなくなってる君を
subtitles.english: you've become numb.

subtitles.original: いたわりの口づけで
subtitles.english: With a caring kiss,

subtitles.original: 弱らせてとろかして
subtitles.english: I'll weaken you and make you melt.

subtitles.original: 差し上げましょ！
subtitles.english: Let me give it to you!

subtitles.original: 妖精たちが 夏を刺激する
subtitles.english: The fairies stimulate summer,

subtitles.original: 生足 魅惑の マーメイド
subtitles.english: mermaid with seductive bare legs.

subtitles.original: 出すとこ出して たわわになったら
subtitles.english: Showing what's to be shown, when it's ripened,

subtitles.original: 宝物の君も オールオッケー
subtitles.english: you, my treasure, are all okay too.

subtitles.original: 妖精 夏を 誰としたくなる
subtitles.english: Fairy, who do you want to spend summer with?

subtitles.original: 一人寝の夜に You can say good-bye
subtitles.english: You can say goodbye to nights sleeping alone.

subtitles.original: 奥の方まで 乾かないままで
subtitles.english: Until the deep inside, without drying out,

subtitles.original: 本気の夏恋しなせえな
subtitles.english: let's have a serious summer love.

subtitles.original: secret base ～君がくれたもの～
subtitles.english: secret base ~Kimi ga Kureta Mono~

subtitles.original: 君と夏の終わり 将来の夢
subtitles.english: The end of summer with you, dreams of the future,

subtitles.original: 大きな希望 忘れない
subtitles.english: and big hopes, I won't forget them.

subtitles.original: 10年後の8月
subtitles.english: In August, ten years from now,

subtitles.original: また出会えるのを 信じて
subtitles.english: I believe we'll meet again.

subtitles.original: 最高の 思い出を…
subtitles.english: The best memories...

subtitles.original: 出会いはふとした瞬間
subtitles.english: Our meeting was just a sudden moment,

subtitles.original: 帰り道の交差点で
subtitles.english: at the intersection on the way home.

subtitles.original: 声をかけてくれたね
subtitles.english: You called out to me,

subtitles.original: 「一緒に帰ろう」
subtitles.english: saying, 'Let's go home together.'
